title: Hercules
brief_description: Hercules is a little fire engine pulled by horses and is happy working with his three human friends - Hokey, Pokey and Smokey. One day Hercules is called to a fire, but is beaten there by new motorised fire engines. Hercules is ashamed and eventually replaced by the faster engines, until one day he is called upon to save the day. Based on the book written by Hardie Gramatky.
